Meet the X.js ðŸŽ‰

A tiny & powerful JS library for creating interactive user interfaces.

It offers a Vue-like declarative API and development using markup-oriented code, with automatic reacts, updates, and renders the new view in real-time.

Accept cookie

The "We use cookies!" window will pop up whenever the page is reloaded. However, after clicking on the "Ok, accepted" button, x.js will remember the user's choice and will not display it.
